I needed to burn out the Console Disc 3. To a DVD to make it to work. Evry thing works no (but i dosen't dl any more xbmc 2.0 ..)

For the most part it is a good version.  Just don't unzip the trainers in the Trainer folder on C drive.  It will make your xbox reboot over and over.  To fix you can start xbox by using the open cd drive button and ftping in the xbox.  From there you can go to C: drive and rename the trainer folder to trainer1.  You could also delete all the files in the folder but the renaming  is faster.
squirl14 - I needed to: Burnout Console Disc 3.0 on a DVD-R. And format the harddrive . And install EvoX & xbmc (the "old" one).. So don't use this shit yet. Or use, gasdrives
